summary: An Ordinance authorizing the Mayor and City Comptroller to issue Local Improvement Bonds for the improvement of Thirty-third Avenue Northwest from West Seventieth Street to West Seventy-fourth Street et al in the City of Seattle, by constructing concrete sidewalks under Ordinance No. 21746, creating Local Improvement District No. 2187 prescribing the rate of interest thereon and authorizing their delivery to the contractor constructing the improvement.
